item.title: Flutter Notifications Without Firebase
item.description: We are going to discuss how to display notifications using the flutter_local_notifications plugin. As always with these posts, you can be sure you’ve got all of the basic knowledge you need by reading my Flutter book, but not all of you like that way of learning, so I’ll list the topics which are considered prerequisites for this post.
